print.too-many-characters: Your script has too many characters ({nchars}). The max amount recommended is 25. This might look broken in print. Continue?
print.ios: Printing from iOS devices is not supported yet. You can try anyway, but it might not look good.

settings.script-type-explanation: A Teensyville script is a script made specifically for smaller player counts (fewer than 7 players). They normally have fewer characters than a standard script. This setting only affects the script analytics, the randomiser, and some UI elements.
settings.bloodstar-image-correction-explanation: The icons that bloodstar.xyz generates have a small amount of padding at the bottom, so they are not quite centered. Enabling this setting offsets that padding.
settings.view-tour: Click {link}here{/link} to view the tour again.

analysis.heading: Script Analytics
analysis.maximum-character-recommendation: The recommended maximum number of characters is {number}.
analysis.maximum-character-recommendation-teensy: The recommended maximum number of characters in Teensyville is {number}.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-full-townsfol: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Townsfolk.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-full-outsider: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Outsiders.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-full-minion: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Minions.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-full-demon: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Demons.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-full-townsf: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Townsfolk.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-full-outsid: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Outsiders.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-full-minion: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Minions.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-full-demon: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Demons.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-teensy-townsf: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Townsfolk in Teensyville.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-teensy-outsid: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Outsiders in Teensyville.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-teensy-minion: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Minions in Teensyville.
analysis.range-exact-recommendation-teensy-demon: It is recommended to have exactly {number} Demons in Teensyville.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-teensy-town: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Townsfolk in Teensyville.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-teensy-outs: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Outsiders in Teensyville.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-teensy-mini: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Minions in Teensyville.
analysis.range-between-recommendation-teensy-demo: It is recommended to have between {lower} and {upper} Demons in Teensyville.

no-outsider-mod.title: No Outsider modification
no-outsider-mod.msg: Without Outsider modification, evil players cannot reliably pretend to be Outsiders.

+choirboy-king.title: Choirboy, but no King
+choirboy-king.msg: Scripts with a Choirboy must have a King.

+huntsman-damsel.title: Huntsman, but no Damsel
+huntsman-damsel.msg: Scripts with a Huntsman must have a Damsel.

tour.welcome-01: This is a brand new script tool for {bold}Blood on the Clocktower{/bold}! This tour will give you a quick overview of the basic features to get you started.
tour.add-and-remove-characters-01: You can {bold}add a character{/bold} from the characters tab. Click on any character you want to add.
tour.add-and-remove-characters-02: To {bold}remove a character{/bold}, click it again here, or click on its icon in the script.
tour.add-and-remove-characters-03: If you’re on mobile, you can open this tab by swiping right or tapping the {menuIcon} button on the top left. You can close it by swiping left.
tour.add-and-remove-characters-04: You can also quickly add characters using the ‘quick add’ input, which you can toggle by pressing the {plusIcon} button.
tour.script-name-and-authors-01: The {bold}script name and authors{/bold} can be changed here.
tour.undo-redo-01: If you mess up, don’t worry! You can always {block}{undoIcon} undo{/block} or {block}{redoIcon} redo{/block} it. You can also empty the script by clicking the {binIcon} button.
tour.multiple-scripts-01: You can click on the {heading}scripts{/heading} tab here to see all the scripts you’ve been working on.
tour.multiple-scripts-02: You can switch between up to {bold}25 recent scripts{/bold} here.
tour.import-export-share-01: You can {block}{importIcon} import{/block}, {block}{exportIcon} export{/block}, or {block}{shareIcon} share{/block} scripts from here. Homebrew characters and scripts are supported!
tour.import-export-share-02: Clicking the {block}{shareIcon} share{/block} button will give you a special ‘script link’, which allows anyone to view your script directly in the tool. Try it out!
tour.import-export-share-03: You can also view this tour again from the {block}{settingsIcon} settings{/block} menu.
tour.autosort-01: By default, all scripts are automatically {link}{sortIcon} {block}SAO sorted{/block}{/link} – it even works for homebrew characters! This can be toggled on & off here.
tour.script-analytics-01: If there are any issues with your script, they will be displayed here.
tour.final-01: That’s all for now! If you want to view this tour again, you can do so from the {block}{settingsIcon} settings{/block} menu.

ctxmenu.pinned-details: A pinned character stays where it is, even if auto-sorting is turned on.
ctxmenu.draft-details: A draft character is not yet fully committed to the script. If you hit the randomise button, draft characters will be replaced by a character of the same type.

toast.cannot-remove-bootlegger: There are homebrew characters on this script, so you can't remove the Bootlegger.

author: Author
name: Name
external-image-confirm: Are you sure you want to allow custom images? A malicious script file author might track your IP address this way. The Pandemonium Institute has no control over the images being provided by other users of the app.
delete-script-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this script? This action is irreversible.
randomise-details: The randomiser will fill out your script with random draft characters.
commit-details: Commit this character to the script so that it will not be removed if the randomise button is pressed.
commit-all-details: Commit all draft characters to the script.
import-typing-error: This box exists to allow pasting JSONs on mobile and touch devices. Typing and submitting is not allowed.
add-bootlegger-rules: Click the plus icon to add a bootlegger rule.
click-drag-move: Click to remove, drag to move
character-tooltip: Drag to move, double click or right click to show the context menu
